entry.title: Astroship for Android released
entry.content:
We are proud to present our first Reverse Game for Android, available right now to download for free from the Google Play store.

Find more information on the project page, or on the Google Play page.

Update (2014-05-01)

The app has been removed from the Google Play Store for an alleged copyright infringement. It is true that the game was a tribute to the original Asteroids game from Atari with a completely different gameplay and without any kind of profit.

Maybe we should feel honored that Atari and it’s efficient team of attorneys have considered Astroship to be a worthy competitor for their game.
